explains: n. 调味品；佐料；风干；增添趣味的东西
wordGroup: flood season 汛期，洪水期；洪水季节
out of season 过时；不合时宜；失去时机
growing season 生长期，生育期；生长季节
dry season 枯水季节；干旱期
hot season n. 炎热的季节
breeding season 繁殖期；繁殖季节；生殖季
off season 淡季；非生产季节

sentences.en: The roasted seasoning largely overpowered any other flavour, although there was slightly bitter after taste.
sentences.cn: 烤过的佐料在很大程度上盖过了所有别的味道，尽管尝过之后会比之前更苦一点。

sentences.en: The dried aromatic leaf of the laurel (Laurus nobilis) can be used as a seasoning in cooking.
sentences.cn: 月桂树（月桂属）的干香叶，可以在烹调中用作调味品。

sentences.en: 2 teaspoons Old Bay seasoning or Creole seasoning.
sentences.cn: 2茶匙欧贝调味料或克里奥调味料。
